name: Castlevania The Lecarde Chronicles 2

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/CastlevaniaTLC/Castlevania The Lecarde Chronicles 2 upc.exe

content:
custom-name: Castlevania - The Lecarde Chronicles 2
files:
- file:
    filename: Castlevania-The-Lecarde-Chronicles-2.zip
    referer: https://lutris.net
    url: https://dl.myabandonware.com/t/t0UNxb6gY3m19Vt487m9Ms72MNGvHpbMDs34IJF44u9255i6jg/Castlevania-The-Lecarde-Chronicles-2_Win_EN-FR-ES-DE-IT-JA.zip
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/CastlevaniaTLC/Castlevania The Lecarde Chronicles
    2 upc.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/CastlevaniaTLC/
    file: file
    format: zip
